character.name: Sierra
description: Your local arsonist and overall troublemaker. She utilizes <c=keyword>oil</c> to convert <c=downside>heat</c> into immediate damage, and loves <c=keyword>wrecking up midrow objects</c>.

Oil.name: Oil
Oil.description: When receiving <c=status>HEAT</c>, take equal amounts of damage instead. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 after triggering.</c>

Intimidation.name: Intimidation
Intimidation.description: Take {0} damage when the opposing ship destroys a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 after triggering</c>.

description.A: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> in front of the <c=parttrait>missile bay</c> to gain 3 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.B: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> in front of the <c=parttrait>ship</c> to gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.None: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> in front of the <c=parttrait>missile bay</c> to gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. Costs 1 more <c=energy>energy</c> this combat.

description.A: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> to gain 2 <c=status>temp shield</c>.
description.B: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> to gain 2 <c=status>temp shield</c>.
description.None: Destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> to gain 2 <c=status>temp shield</c>.

TurnEndTrigger.name: TURN END TRIGGER
TurnEndTrigger.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, trigger the actions below the line.

OilDrum.name: OIL DRUM
OilDrum.description: Destroying this will apply 1 <c=status>OIL</c> to its' destroyer.

CheapBeer.name: CHEAP BEER
CheapBeer.description: Gain 2 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> whenever you destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. <c=downside>Every turn, if you have less than 4 <c=status>INTIMIDATION</c>, gain 1 <c=status>INTIMIDATION</c></c>.

PassiveAggression.name: PASSIVE AGGRESSION
PassiveAggression.description: Apply 1 <c=status>INTIMIDATION</c> to the enemy every turn. <c=downside>Your attacks deal 1 less damage.</c>

SprayCan.name: SPRAY CAN
SprayCan.description: Increase <c=status>HEAT</c> applied to the enemy by 1.

SlimeAndPunishment.name: SLIME & PUNISHMENT
SlimeAndPunishment.description: Whenever you gain <c=status>OIL</c> or destroy a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

ThickGel.name: THICK GEL
ThickGel.description: Every turn, if you have 2 or more <c=status>OIL</c>, lose 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>.

SpaceJunk.name: SPACE JUNK
SpaceJunk.description: 2 <c=midrow>oil drums</c> will always be near your ship at the start of combat.
